data.title: When does NBA free agency start? Everything you need to know about the offseason
data.meta_description: The NBA offseason is in full gear with the 2024 NBA Draft already in the rearview mirror. Here's everything you need to know about NBA free agency.
data.text:
The NBA offseason is in full gear with the 2024 NBA Draft already in the rearview mirror.

Now it's time for free agency. Here's everything you need to know as it gets started:

When does NBA free agency start

According to the NBA, here are key dates for the 2024 free agent period:

Day After Last Game of NBA Finals: Each NBA team may begin negotiating with upcoming free agents who finished the just-completed season on its roster.

June 30: Each NBA team may begin negotiating with all other upcoming free agents beginning at 6 p.m. ET.

July 6: Each NBA team may begin signing free agents to contracts 12:01 p.m. ET.

2024 NBA draft: Grades for all 30 teams: Who hit the jackpot?
